channel.title: Help putting server on serverstatus page!
channel.description:
Alright, before when i used to post my server on status page it worked fine. But now for some reason when I try to put my server onto the page it shows me this:
You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MySQL server version for the right syntax to use near ' IP` = 'hobbitscape.no-ip.biz' OR `ipfield` = '76.224.16.80'' at line 1
Can anyone help me out on fixing this problem?.. [br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 09, 2008, 09:21:50 PM[/size][hr]:s

item.title: Help putting server on serverstatus page!

@Ardvark wrote:

I already knew this, sorry should have posted. I found as soon as i posted pretty much.

Read full topic
